captions.text: Let us go on an adventure.

You will be my friend.
(OMG YES PLS)

You will be my friend.
(MY SPLEEN HURTS)
Soon all will feel my friendliness.
What a lovely dinner for friendship.
What a lovely death for friendship.
I must return to my people.
